'''Iris Rogerson''' is the second cousin of [[Lillie Jordan]].

==History==
After Lillie died, Iris came to the practice to pick up [[Milo (Cat)|Milo]], saying she'd agreed to take care of him, but Addison decided to keep him.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
She and her cousin weren't close, but Lillie asked her to make the arrangements after she died.
